dialogueLines.line: Leave me alone, I'm a busy man with far more important matters to take care of than listening to you.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: I'm a little hungry right now!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I was wondering if I could have some of your body! Even if it's just a finger!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Touch my body and I'll make sure you stay buried in whatever dirt hole you came from.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad
